data.title: Steenbergen, North Brabant, Netherlands
data.text:
Steenbergen, a municipality in North Brabant, Netherlands, is situated at the convergence of the rivers Mark and Dintel, offering picturesque views. Its rich history dates back to the 12th century, when it was granted city rights and became an important trading center, leaving behind a legacy of heritage sites.
